sentences.sContent: He did not have much success, but tried not to get too disconsolate.
sentences.sCn: 他没有获得太大的成功，但也试着不让自己太过郁闷。

synos.tran: 郁郁不乐的；忧郁的；孤独的

remMethod.val: dis(不) + con + sol(安慰) + ate → 没有安慰的 → 闷闷不乐的

words.tran: 悲伤地，愁闷地；凄凉地；令人不快地

trans.tranCn: 闷闷不乐的， 郁郁寡欢的
trans.tranOther: Someone who is disconsolate is very unhappy and depressed
